trans-unit.source: The <see cref="N:System.Drawing" /> namespace provides access to GDI+ basic graphics functionality.
trans-unit.target: O namespace <see cref="N:System.Drawing" /> fornece acesso à funcionalidade de gráfico básica da GDI+.

trans-unit.source: More advanced functionality is provided in the <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Drawing2D" />, <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Imaging" />, and <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Text" /> namespaces.
trans-unit.target: Mais funcionalidade avançada é fornecida nos namespaces <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Drawing2D" />, <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Imaging" /> e <see cref="N:System.Drawing.Text" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> class provides methods for drawing to the display device.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> classe fornece métodos para desenhar o dispositivo de vídeo.

trans-unit.source: Classes such as <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> and <xref:System.Drawing.Point> encapsulate GDI+ primitives.
trans-unit.target: Classes como <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> e <xref:System.Drawing.Point> encapsular primitivos de GDI+.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> class is used to draw lines and curves, while classes derived from the abstract class <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> are used to fill the interiors of shapes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Drawing.Pen> classe é usada para desenhar linhas e curvas ao classes derivadas da classe abstrata <xref:System.Drawing.Brush> são usados para preencher os interiores das formas.

trans-unit.source: Classes within the <xref:System.Drawing> namespace are not supported for use within a Windows or ASP.NET service.
trans-unit.target: Classes de dentro do <xref:System.Drawing> namespace não têm suporte para uso em um serviço do Windows ou do ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: Attempting to use these classes from within one of these application types may produce unexpected problems, such as diminished service performance and run-time exceptions.
trans-unit.target: Tentativa de usar essas classes de dentro de um desses tipos de aplicativo pode gerar problemas inesperados, como diminuído exceções de desempenho e tempo de execução de serviço.

trans-unit.source: For a supported alternative, see [Windows Imaging Components](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ee719654\(v=vs.85\).aspx).
trans-unit.target: Para uma alternativa com suporte, consulte [componentes do Windows Imaging](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/desktop/ee719654\(v=vs.85\).aspx).
